quote: Oh, I have a habit of letting myself be lectured on the things I know best. I like to see if they are understood in the same way I understand; for there are many ways of knowing the same thing
quote_letters: OH I HAVE A HABIT OF LETTING MYSELF BE LECTURED ON THE THINGS I KNOW BEST I LIKE TO SEE IF THEY ARE UNDERSTOOD IN THE SAME WAY I UNDERSTAND FOR THERE ARE MANY WAYS OF KNOWING THE SAME THING
